includedAssets.title: The Lady in the Lake
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep1 - The Lady in the Lake
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy moves to LA to help Chief Daniel Sousa at the West Coast Strategic Scientific Reserve investigate a bizarre homicide.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy moves to LA to help Chief Daniel Sousa at the West Coast Strategic Scientific Reserve investigate a bizarre homicide.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy moves to LA to help Chief Daniel Sousa at the West Coast Strategic Scientific Reserve investigate a bizarre homicide.

includedAssets.title: A View In The Dark
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep2 - A View In The Dark
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy discovers her investigation has huge ramifications that can destroy her career, as well as everyone near and dear to her.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy discovers her investigation has huge ramifications that can destroy her career, as well as everyone near and dear to her.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy discovers her investigation has huge ramifications that can destroy her career, as well as everyone near and dear to her.

includedAssets.title: Better Angels
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy's search for the truth about Zero Matter puts her on a collision course with her superiors as Howard Stark barnstorms in.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy's search for the truth about Zero Matter puts her on a collision course with her superiors as Howard Stark barnstorms in.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy's search for the truth about Zero Matter puts her on a collision course with her superiors as Howard Stark barnstorms in.

includedAssets.title: Smoke & Mirrors
includedAssets.synopsis: Agent Carter and the SSR learn there's more than just a pretty face behind Hollywood's Whitney Frost, Peggy's most dangerous foe yet.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Agent Carter and the SSR learn there's more than just a pretty face behind Hollywood's Whitney Frost, Peggy's most dangerous foe yet.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Agent Carter and the SSR learn there's more than just a pretty face behind Hollywood's Whitney Frost, Peggy's most dangerous foe yet.

includedAssets.title: The Atomic Job
includedAssets.synopsis: As Jarvis' skills are put to the test, Peggy must find a way to stop an explosion that threatens to destroy all of California.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Jarvis' skills are put to the test, Peggy must find a way to stop an explosion that threatens to destroy all of California.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Jarvis' skills are put to the test, Peggy must find a way to stop an explosion that threatens to destroy all of California.

includedAssets.title: Life Of The Party
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep6 - Life Of The Party
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy turns to her most unexpected adversary for help, while Whitney makes a move to control the deadly Zero Matter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy turns to her most unexpected adversary for help, while Whitney makes a move to control the deadly Zero Matter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy turns to her most unexpected adversary for help, while Whitney makes a move to control the deadly Zero Matter.

includedAssets.title: Monsters
includedAssets.synopsis: As Peggy plots a rescue mission, Whitney hunts for even more dark power; and Jarvis learns he should not make promises he cannot keep.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Peggy plots a rescue mission, Whitney hunts for even more dark power; and Jarvis learns he should not make promises he cannot keep.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Peggy plots a rescue mission, Whitney hunts for even more dark power; and Jarvis learns he should not make promises he cannot keep.

includedAssets.title: The Edge of Mystery
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep8 - The Edge of Mystery
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy and Sousa propose a trade with Whitney Frost, while the SSR gets help that may be the key to eliminating Zero Matter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy and Sousa propose a trade with Whitney Frost, while the SSR gets help that may be the key to eliminating Zero Matter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy and Sousa propose a trade with Whitney Frost, while the SSR gets help that may be the key to eliminating Zero Matter.

includedAssets.title: A Little Song And Dance
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep9 - A Little Song And Dance
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy tries to save Dr. Wilkes with a plan to stop Whitney Frost, but Thompson makes a move that could destroy them all.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Peggy tries to save Dr. Wilkes with a plan to stop Whitney Frost, but Thompson makes a move that could destroy them all.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Peggy tries to save Dr. Wilkes with a plan to stop Whitney Frost, but Thompson makes a move that could destroy them all.

includedAssets.title: Hollywood Ending
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy needs Howard Stark to eliminate Zero Matter as they are faced with a mission none of them could come back from.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy Carter heads to LA as a terrifying new evil of the atomic age threatens world peace. Comic book drama set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Hayley Atwell and James D’Arcy star.

includedIn.title: Marvel's Agent Carter
includedIn.synopsis: When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits his old friend Agent Peggy Carter to help clear his name, with the aid of his devoted butler, Edwin Jarvis.
